mapper.select: select * from trade_info where market = #{market} order by trade_date asc
mapper.insert:
insert into trade_info (market,trade_date,trade_price,acc_trade_volume) values
(#{item.market},#{item.tradeDate},#{item.tradePrice},#{item.accTradeVolume})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE trade_price = values (trade_price), acc_trade_volume = values(acc_trade_volume)
